divs: sighting detailsi had noticed some unusual contrails and was observing them on this clear night for about 2 to 3 minutes when i suddenly observed a long thin object (perhaps 400 feet x 20 feet wide) with 3 dim pinkish or amber lights perhaps 1000 feet up moving in a due south direction at about 600 to 800mph. the object was slightly askew, maybe 10 to 15 degrees, but moving in straight course. a grey solid surface was evident. there was no sound. i lost sight of it as it passed over a neighbors roof top. my initial response was "what in the hell was that?". i have lived near jfk and laguardia airports all my life and have never seen anything like it. it left me with a very uneasy feeling. fast forward to last night. 3\7\08. this was the first night since my encounter where the sky was again clear. i looked to the same area expecting to see nothing when suddenly i observed 2 whitish \ yellowish relatively bright lights moving north to south again at a very fast rate of speed. another set followed about 5 minutes later. these were completely different from what i observed the first evening. these actually looked as if they might be some sort of huge spot lights, but unlike any i have seen before. a half hour later i returned to my yard to have a smoke and to my complete amazement observed 5 bright whitish, yellow lights in a triangular \ delta formation (one light in front and 2 on each side) heading from east to west, and again at a very fast rate of speed and silent. this was again different from the other observations. at this point i'm thinking this must be something being projected from somewhere ground based. there is no way i'm the only one who has observed this. no way. i began to think if tonight's observation may have been a way by someone to cover up what i observed the first night. while tonight's observation left me with the feeling that it could be something domestically projected, my original sighting was clearly unearthly. one odd thing was that after tonight's first observation i went to use my cell phone which i had just fully charged and it was completely dead. i have no idea what is going on here, but it's all starting to make feel terribly stupid. i'm afraid to talk about it and the few times i have i was met with understandable disbelief and sneers. if tonight's lights turn out to be some supermarket grand opening, or movie debut i would feel dumb, but ultimately much better about everything. i wish this could all be logically explained to me.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around March 3rd 2008
Summary: 3 dim pinkish lights / grey back ground / silent & fast moving north to south on slightly skewed angle.
